```{r eval=FALSE}
library(decryptr)

arqs <- dir('~/decryptr/captchaTJMGAudio/data-raw/treino_img', 
            full.names = TRUE, pattern = 'jpg$') %>% 
  head(1000) %>% 
  read_captcha()

model <- decryptrModels::read_model('tjmg')
bd <- prepare(arqs)

tjmg <- list(model = model, labs = dimnames(bd$y)[[3]])
class(tjmg) <- "captcha"

devtools::use_data(tjmg)
```
